Articles.Content:
![SpmNXzD.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/SpmNXzD.png?1)
* * *

**UTK AEROSPACE**

**UBER TECHNOLOGIES KOMPANY**

[http://tjgrommesh.wix.com/utk-industries](http://tjgrommesh.wix.com/utk-industries)

A branch of the Uber Technologies Kompany devoted to the future of Aeronautics and Aerospace. Innovations such as the inflatable microwave, hand crank tooth brush, and Rocket Powered refrigerator... are just a few examples of how UTK has helped to shape your society! Our top Kerbal engineers are on the job and have created something unseen by anyone before. The love child of UTK and B9 Aerospace, comes the F-44 Kobra Strike Aircraft!

 **F-44 KOBRA***(v.6)*

**ADVANCED STRIKE FIGHTER**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fF-ZPka2UtI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Features:**

- Nearly perfect aerodynamics

- Extreme maneuverability

- Speeds in Excess of 500 m/s (1,800 Km/h)

- Aviation Lights

- Landing Lights

- BDArmory Compatible 

DOWNLOAD:

[Kerbal](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/602/The%20F-44%20Kobra)Xor Github(Broken) or Media fire(Broken)

**Required Mods:**

-*B9 Aerospace*

*-BahaSP*

*-JSI*

*-KineTechAnimation*

*-ResGen, SmokeScreen*

*-Virgin\_Kalactic*

*-FAR* 

*-BDArmory*

*-Firespitter*

*-MP\_Nazari*

*-Klockheed\_Martin\_Gimbal*

~*The Mods: B9 Aerospace, BahaSP, JSI, KineTechAnimation, ResGen, SmokeScreen, Virgin\_Kalactic, FAR, BDArmory, Firespitter, and MP\_Nazari, Klockheed\_Martin\_Gimbal have not been created my me. I do not own these mods!*~

* * *

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-28T15:33:44Z" title="02/28/2015 03:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 28, 2015</time> by UTK Aerospace Ind.**
  
Added CC Licence Deed

You don't need to redistribute mods used by your craft file - in fact, it is very very bad practice to do so, because your download will conflict with existing mods users have installed for their game.

Just upload the craft file itself, strip out everything else and list the mods you used in your post.
Thank you! I am very new to this so all the help is much appreciated!

> 
> Thank you! I am very new to this so all the help is much appreciated!

Great looking little fighter you have there. May I make a few suggestions?

-I would dump the additional intakes on the sides of the lightning cockpit, they aren't needed. The cockpit has intakes in it. 

-I would add a gun, the BDarmory hidden 20mm is a wonderful weapon and fits nicely in the design scheme of the aircraft. 

Last the B9 parts are not meant to be used with stock aerodynamics. I would suggest getting FAR or NEAR to get the most out of those parts. Because B9 alters the way jet engines work so they work correctly in FAR.

Thank you for the suggestions! I didn't want to add any weapons to the base craft, because some people may not want to run BDArmory with the craft. I suppose I could just include it in the download without the option...? I am constantly in the game tweaking the plane to make it better, so ill go in and see what i can do.

Hello UTK, as sumghai already mentioned, distributing other people's mod can not only cause issues, but can be also illegal by breaking their licenses.

Your download links have been removed until you either provide proper permission of redistribution of every single mod that requires it or remove the mods from your downloads.

I heavily recommend you to remove the mods from your downloads, you can easily link to them instead, or suggest that people use [CKAN](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97434-The-Comprehensive-Kerbal-Archive-Network-Call-for-mod-participation) which will allow them to pick the mods very quickly.

We don't want to ruin your fun, just making some things clear so you can share your crafts at will without any trouble.

And talking about sharing crafts, you should take a look at [KerbalX](http://kerbalx.com/), it automatically detects all the mods being used by your craft and lists them and the parts of them that it's using, it's just amazing.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T04:00:19Z" title="02/22/2015 04:00  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by tetryds**

Right away! I apologize for the mishap!

I am in the process of releasing a new version now!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T21:30:27Z" title="02/22/2015 09:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by UTK Aerospace Ind.**
Head's up - I have removed this from Kerbal Stuff. Do not upload craft files to KS.
